source.name: Wanderer's Guide To Merchants & Magic
source.author: J. A. Valeur, S. K. Valeur
source.artist: Nana Landholt Petersen, Mariana Livraes, Douglas Deri
source.description:
All adventurers will eventually want to buy, sell, and trade magic items. In 5E, that's easier said than done â€” and usually requires hours of tedious preparation for the DM.
Because what are the rules for buying and selling magic items? How do you price magic items in 5E? And what does a magic shop look like?
Wanderer's Guide to Merchants & Magic gives you everything you need to make trading magic items fun for the players and easy for the DM.
